---
title: "oci_provided_full.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines the configuration for an OCI (Open Container Initiative) storage type. It specifies details such as the repository, authentication credentials, polling interval, and manifest version for interacting with an OCI-compliant container registry.

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The root configuration block for storage settings.

#### Internal Logic
Defines the storage type as "oci" and includes nested configuration specific to OCI storage.

### `storage.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of storage being configured.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | The storage type, set to "oci" |

### `storage.oci`
#### Description
Contains the configuration details specific to OCI storage.

#### Internal Logic
Defines various settings for interacting with an OCI-compliant container registry, including repository information, authentication, and polling behavior.

### `storage.oci.repository`
#### Description
Specifies the target repository for the OCI storage.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| repository | string | The full path to the target repository, including the image tag |

### `storage.oci.bundles_directory`
#### Description
Defines the local directory path where bundles will be stored.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| bundles_directory | string | The local filesystem path for storing bundles |

### `storage.oci.authentication`
#### Description
Contains authentication credentials for accessing the OCI repository.

#### Internal Logic
Provides username and password for authentication with the OCI registry.

### `storage.oci.authentication.username`
#### Description
The username for authenticating with the OCI registry.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| username | string | The authentication username |

### `storage.oci.authentication.password`
#### Description
The password for authenticating with the OCI registry.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| password | string | The authentication password |

### `storage.oci.poll_interval`
#### Description
Specifies the interval at which to poll the OCI repository for updates.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| poll_interval | duration | The time interval between polls, set to 5 minutes |

### `storage.oci.manifest_version`
#### Description
Defines the version of the manifest to use when interacting with the OCI registry.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| manifest_version | string | The version of the manifest, set to "1.0" |

## Configuration
This YAML file defines the following configuration options:

| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| storage.type | string | "oci" | Specifies the storage type as OCI |
| storage.oci.repository | string | "some.target/repository/abundle:latest" | The target OCI repository |
| storage.oci.bundles_directory | string | "/tmp/bundles" | Local directory for storing bundles |
| storage.oci.authentication.username | string | "foo" | Username for OCI registry authentication |
| storage.oci.authentication.password | string | "bar" | Password for OCI registry authentication |
| storage.oci.poll_interval | duration | "5m" | Interval for polling the OCI repository |
| storage.oci.manifest_version | string | "1.0" | Version of the manifest to use |

Note: This configuration file appears to be a test data file, as indicated by its location in the "testdata" directory. It provides a full example of OCI storage configuration for testing purposes.
